lines.text: You're in for a disappointment. I've gotten powerful enough inthe last 15 years to make you beg for mercy.
Fine by me. I'm about to beg you to stop talking.

Something about you is different. Something I can't quite put my finger on. Who are you? Why are you here? You look like the man demon but act nothing like him. You're an imposter. If that the case, then Dark Scneider must be dead.
Then I'll kill you as well. I'll kill you dead! And I'll do it using this sword. Now die! Damn your legendary immortality!
